pullrequest.title: Added the ability to split ramps.

content.raw: There is also the possibility that issue #39 is actually the cause of the crash you saw (the first clock tick of a ramp, rather than the last, is too short). I'll try and also patch that soon, but it's a bit harder to do and probably needs to wait until @cbillington is back so he can review it.
content.html: There is also the possibility that issue #39 is actually the cause of the crash you saw (the first clock tick of a ramp, rather than the last, is too short). I'll try and also patch that soon, but it's a bit harder to do and probably needs to wait until @cbillington is back so he can review it.
